desc: Seniors study topics of current interest, based upon presentations by staff, participants, and visitors, library research and assigned readings. P/N only. Available on request. May be repeated if topics are different. Prerequisites: PHYS 374, PHYS 375, and PHYS 376.
name: Senior Seminar
